channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Team USA settles in to athletes' villages, 'smash' pizzas
item.description: U.S. Olympic athletes are arriving and settling into their digs for the next couple of weeks in Italy. Curlers are amazed by the mountain scenery in C...

item.title: Measles continues to spread in the US, but with some letup
item.description: As South Carolina's outbreak grows to 876 confirmed cases, vaccinations in the state surged in January. Cases have also been reported in two ICE deten...

item.title: Homan to draw down agents in Minnesota. And, U.S.-Russia nuclear arms deal expires
item.description: U.S. border czar Tom Homan says 700 federal agents will be leaving Minnesota. And, the New START Treaty between the U.S. and Russia expired today.

item.title: 'More relevant every day' in the U.S.: A filmmaker documented Russia's journalists
item.description: Julia Loktev's documentary My Undesirable Friends follows young independent journalists covering Putin's invasion of Ukraine.

item.title: The Winter Olympics get 8 new events, including the first new sport in decades
item.description: Ski mountaineering will make its Olympic debut this year, the first winter sport to do so since 2002. Skeleton, luge, ski jumping and moguls are also ...

item.title: Bio lab found in Las Vegas is similar to California scene, officials say
item.description: Officials in Reedley, California said they had tried to warn federal authorities about the possibility of similar labs after one was found there in 20...

item.title: Naked images remained in Epstein files despite outcry
item.description: Four images seen by BBC Verify show partially clothed women with their faces and bodies unredacted.

item.title: Russia says huge meteorite chunk discovered before being smuggled to U.K.
item.description: Russia's customs service says a 2.8-ton chunk of the Aletai meteorite was found in a shipping container, labeled as a garden ornament.

item.title: US must be prudent when supplying arms to Taiwan, Xi tells Trump
item.description: Their call comes in the wake of a flurry of visits by Western leaders to China in recent months.

item.title: Criminals plot to sack Super Bowl fans for a loss with these online scams
item.description: Lawmakers are warning Americans to beware the many financial scams linked to Super Bowl LX, from fake betting sites to counterfeit tickets.

item.title: Dozens of Muslims 'massacred' in Nigeria for refusing to join jihadists, says governor
item.description: At least 78 bodies have been buried, while there are fears that around 170 people were killed altogether.

item.title: 55,000 Ukrainian soldiers killed in war with Russia, Zelensky says
item.description: The Ukrainian president also said a large number of people were "officially missing", meaning the total death toll is thought to be much higher.

item.title: Arizona Department of Public Safety helicopter crash kills pilot and trooper during shooter response
What is the price of silver today: February 5, 2026?
item.description: Considering a silver investment in today's economic climate? Here's where the price stands as of February 5, 2026.

item.title: Suspect identified in disappearance of four-year-old in Australian outback
item.description: Gus Lamont was last seen playing outside his home on a remote sheep station on 27 September.

item.title: Washington Post begins sweeping layoffs as it scales back news coverage
item.description: Former WaPo executive editor Martin Baron told CBS News the paper's coverage will be "dramatically diminished" because of the job cuts.

item.title: Trump’s border czar is pulling 700 immigration officers out of Minnesota immediately
item.description: President Donald Trump’s border czar says he is reducing the number of immigration enforcement officers in Minnesota after state and local officials a...

item.title: Savannah Guthrie posts message to her mother’s kidnapper asking to provide proof she is alive
